title: SITUATIONSHIPS: Relationship Poems and Short Stories
description: SITUATIONSHIPS: Relationship Poems and Short StoriesSITUATIONSHIPS is a collection of poems and short stories about everyday relationships. It was written all based on REAL STORIES from REAL PEOPLE. John Holley Jr. interviewed many people of many different ages and backgrounds and used their stories as inspirations. Every short story and poem is based off one of their stories.-Dealing with great sex but a bad relationship-Living with a liar-Being alone in a relationship-Missing your ex-What it means to have the title-Relationships where kids are involved
author: John Holley Jr.
